Package Description

io.crums.sldg.demo.jurno  
io.crums.sldg.packs
Implementation classes for various bags.
  • Classes in io.crums.sldg.db used by io.crums.sldg.db
    Class Description
    ByteFormatException
    When nonsensical binary data is encountered, this exception is thrown.
    Db
    A directory containing a skip ledger, a crumtrail repo (establishing how old) and a table identifying which rows contain beacon hashes (establishing how young).
    Db.WitnessRecord  
    Db.WitnessReport
    Summary of a ledger witness action.
    EntitySerializer
    Interface for loading an entity (an object of type T) from a standalone file.
    Filenaming
    The file naming convention.
    Format
    File formats for external storage of entities such as ledger paths and nuggets.
